attributes.action: consider the introduction of the offence of vehicular manslaughter for drivers who kill due to drink, drugs, or driving whilst uninsured or banned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present drivers who kill whilst under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or who are driving whilst banned or are uninsured, only receive a " smack on the wrist. ". The punishment should reflect the severity of the crime.
